title: "activity leak" messages flooding the log
body:
### Description
Seeing repeated "Beacon chain is in activity leak" messages in the logs on an abandoned devnet.

Sample logs for a single recent second:

```
2023-12-03 09:39:48.015 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.045 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.075 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.106 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.135 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.165 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.195 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.225 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.255 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.285 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.315 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.345 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.375 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.405 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.435 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.465 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.495 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.525 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.556 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.586 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.615 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.645 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.675 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.706 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.736 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.767 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.797 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.827 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.857 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.888 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.918 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.948 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
2023-12-03 09:39:48.979 INFO  - Beacon chain is in activity leak
```

### Steps to Reproduce (Bug)
Going back to an old devnet, there are many "activity leak" messages showing up.

**Expected behavior:** [What you expect to happen]

Logging this once per epoch seems reasonable.

(It's also "inactivity leak", not "activity leak.)

**Actual behavior:** [What actually happens]

Logged 69,100 times in the last hour.

**Frequency:** [How regularly does it occur?]

Only seeing this on the one chain.

### Versions (Add all that apply)

teku/v23.10.0+4-g2842a8552c/linux-x86_64/-privatebuild-openjdk64bitservervm-java-17
